This is how I add the gif image.  Is the GMAP control aware of the new google.maps.MarkerOptions optimized:false 

 Dim m = New GMapMarkerImage(New PointLatLng(lat2, lng2), New Bitmap("C:\b1.gif"))    Layer_GPSmarker.Markers.Add(m)

In V3, make sure to use optimized:false
http://code.google.com/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#MarkerOptions
GMap.NET does not use the Google Maps API, it only accesses the Google servers, rendering is done in C#.
